<h3 id="X38113">X(38113) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(5), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^6-6*(b+c)*a^5-(5*b^2+4*b*c+5*c^2)*a^4+10*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+6*b*c*(b-c)^2*a^2-4*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38113) = 3*X(2)+X(21168) = X(3)+5*X(18230) = 5*X(3)+X(36991) = X(5)-4*X(6666) = 5*X(5)-2*X(18482) = X(5)+2*X(31658) = X(7)-7*X(3526) = X(9)+2*X(140) = 2*X(9)+X(31657) = 4*X(140)-X(31657) = X(5817)-5*X(18230) = 5*X(5817)-X(36991) = 10*X(6666)-X(18482) = 2*X(6666)+X(31658) = X(18482)+5*X(31658) = X(21153)-3*X(38067) = 5*X(21153)+3*X(38075) = 2*X(21153)+3*X(38082) = 2*X(21153)+X(38139) = 2*X(21168)+3*X(38171) = 2*X(38107)-3*X(38171)</b>
<p>X(38113) lies on these lines: {2,5762}, {3,5817}, {5,516}, {7,3526}, {9,140}, {30,21153}, {142,632}, {144,3525}, {496,15837}, {511,38166}, {515,38179}, {517,38043}, {518,38028}, {527,11539}, {547,38150}, {548,31672}, {549,971}, {631,5779}, {952,6883}, {1001,5690}, {1445,6147}, {1483,24393}, {1484,6594}, {1656,5759}, {1709,7308}, {3090,31671}, {3452,38123}, {3530,5732}, {3564,38117}, {3628,5805}, {3646,5763}, {5044,10165}, {5054,21151}, {5325,10156}, {5657,5804}, {5686,10246}, {5719,11038}, {5840,38180}, {5844,38126}, {5853,38112}, {5856,34126}, {5857,38114}, {6172,15694}, {6173,10124}, {6827,38149}, {8232,24470}, {8236,12433}, {8257,15296}, {9342,19541}, {10283,31837}, {10303,36996}, {15298,15325}, {15699,38137}, {15709,38065}, {16239,20195}, {28160,38158}, {28174,38037}, {28204,38101}, {28224,38154}</p>
<p>
X(38113) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 5817}, {9, 38122}, {5686, 10246}, {21153, 38108}, {21168, 38107}, {38031, 38057}, {38059, 38130}<br>
X(38113) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (31657, 38122), (38043, 38059), (38122, 140), (38139, 38108), (38150, 547), (38171, 2), (38175, 38057)<br>
X(38113) = complement of X(38107)<br>
X(38113) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 21168, 38107), (9, 140, 31657), (6666, 31658, 5), (38067, 38108, 21153), (38082, 38139, 38108), (38131, 38132, 38031)<br>
</p>
